changes.bnf: Keep up to date with the latest significant changes in the BNF that are relevant to your clinical practice. Updated monthly.
changes.bnfc: Keep up to date with the latest significant changes in the BNFC that are relevant to your clinical practice. Updated monthly.

publication-information.bnf: Look up publication details, including how to contact the BNF’s publishers and how to order a printed copy of the BNF in book format.
publication-information.bnfc: Look up publication details, including how to contact the BNFc’s publishers and how to order a printed copy of the BNFc in book format.

preface.bnf: The British National Formulary is a rapid reference resource for the latest information and advice on the safe and effective use of medicines.
preface.bnfc: The British National Formulary for Children is a rapid reference resource for the latest information and advice on the safe and effective use of medicine in children.

acknowledgements.bnf: The Joint Formulary Committee is grateful to individuals and organisations that have provided advice and information to the BNF.
acknowledgements.bnfc: The Paediatric Formulary Committee is grateful to individuals and organisations that have provided advice and information to the BNF for Children.

bnf-staff.bnf: View the content director, editorial staff and support staff responsible for producing the BNF.
bnf-staff.bnfc: View the content director, editorial staff and support staff responsible for producing the BNFc.

joint-formulary-committee.bnf: The Joint Formulary Committee (JFC) is responsible for the content of the BNF. The JFC includes pharmacy, medical, nursing, and lay representatives.
joint-formulary-committee.bnfc: The Joint Formulary Committee (JFC) is responsible for the content of the BNFC. The JFC includes pharmacy, medical, nursing, and lay representatives.

dental-advisory-group.bnf: The Dental Advisory Group oversees preparation of advice on the drug management of dental and oral conditions.
dental-advisory-group.bnfc: The Dental Advisory Group oversees preparation of advice on the drug management of dental and oral conditions.

nurse-prescribers-advisory-group.bnf: The Nurse Prescribers' Advisory Group oversees the list of drugs approved for inclusion in the Nurse Prescribers' Formulary.
nurse-prescribers-advisory-group.bnfc: The Nurse Prescribers' Advisory Group oversees the list of drugs approved for inclusion in the Nurse Prescribers' Formulary.

how-bnf-publications-are-constructed.bnf: Read more about the editorial and production processes behind the construction of the BNF and the assessment of evidence used to make recommendations.
how-bnf-publications-are-constructed.bnfc: Read more about the editorial and production processes behind the construction of the BNFC and the assessment of evidence used to make recommendations.

how-to-use-bnf-publications-online.bnf: View the how-to guide for using the online version of the BNF.
how-to-use-bnf-publications-online.bnfc: View the how-to guide for using the online version of the BNFC.

frequently-asked-questions-for-the-bnf-a.bnf: Get answers to frequently asked questions about the British National Formulary, including how to cite, or reference, the different versions of the BNF and BNFc.
frequently-asked-questions-for-the-bnf-a.bnfc: Get answers to frequently asked questions about the British National Formulary, including how to cite, or reference, the different versions of the BNF and BNFc.

frequently-asked-questions-clinical.bnf: View the answers to commonly asked questions that may come up when using the BNF information and guidance on prescribing.
frequently-asked-questions-clinical.bnfc: View the answers to commonly asked questions that may come up when using the BNFC information and guidance on prescribing.

approximate-conversions-and-units.bnf: Conversions and units tables including growth chart with average weight and height, by gender and age (neonate, child and adult).
approximate-conversions-and-units.bnfc: Conversions and units tables including growth chart with average weight and height, by gender and age (neonate, child and adult).

abbreviations-and-symbols.bnf: Glossary of symbols and abbreviations, including Latin, medication and dosage abbreviations used in the BNF and prescribing.
abbreviations-and-symbols.bnfc: Glossary of symbols and abbreviations, including Latin, medication and dosage abbreviations used in the BNFC and prescribing.

medicines-information-services.bnf: Find contact details for both regional and national medicines information and advice lines/services in the UK.
medicines-information-services.bnfc: Find contact details for both regional and national medicines information and advice lines/services in the UK.

paediatric-formulary-committee.bnf: The Paediatric Formulary Committee (PFC) is responsible for the content of BNF. The PFC includes pharmacy, medical, nursing and lay representatives.
paediatric-formulary-committee.bnfc: The Paediatric Formulary Committee (PFC) is responsible for the content of BNFC. The PFC includes pharmacy, medical, nursing and lay representatives.
